subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The former heavyweight champion Evander Holyfield, 47, will challenge Francois Botha, 41, for the lightly regarded World Boxing Federation title in Uganda on Jan. 16.
snippet: The former heavyweight champion Evander Holyfield, 47, will challenge Francois Botha, 41, for the lightly regarded World Boxing Federation title in Uganda on Jan. 16.
